notesStmt.note: II Kings XXIII 3 ...[את [דברי - XXIV 3 [להסיר מ[על; the missing upper edge of the folio contained XXIII 6-8, 13-14, 18-20, 25-27 and 33-34; Masorah contains only a small fraction of the annotations found in the complete version.
Condition: lacking about a quarter from top edge, interior edge, including part of first column and lower exterior corner; fragment torn into two pieces .

msItem.title: 2nd Kings 23:3-24:3, with Masorah magna and parva (partial)

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)
